channel.title: Noah Van Gorden
channel.description: Recent content on Noah Van Gorden

item.title: About Noah
item.description: I’m passionate about finding creative solutions to tough problems, writing clean code, and building innovative tools for the world to enjoy. When I’m not busy utilizing my skill-set, I’m busy building upon it. While I’m very fortunate that my career and interests align, I’m also aware that all things need balance. So, when I’m away from “work”, I enjoy spending my time exploring new hiking trails, traveling the world, tending to my garden, and renovating my home.
